title: Witches' Water
text:
The Witches' Water () is a <a href="Amusement%20park">theme park</a> at the middle station of the <a href="Aerial%20tramway">cable car</a> at <a href="S%C3%B6ll">Söll</a> in <a href="Tyrol%20%28state%29">Tyrol</a>, <a href="Austria">Austria</a>. The central part is a water park consisting of ponds and rivulets where children can play a variety of water games. It extends over an area of about 500 meters and is complemented by various <a href="%3Awikt%3A%20alpine">alpine</a> restaurants, <a href="playground">playground</a>s and a <a href="petting%20zoo">petting zoo</a>.
There are some <a href="themed%20trail">themed trail</a>s in the surrounding area, for instance a witches' trail tracing past legends; a panoramic trail in front of the Tyrolese <a href="limestone">limestone</a> <a href="alps">alps</a>; or a mile's <a href="Barefoot%20park">barefoot hiking trail</a> featuring opportunities for different kinds of sensory experience. Guests can also visit a <a href="dairy">dairy</a>, a <a href="distillation">distillery</a> or experience <a href="apiculture">apiculture</a>. They can also hike to the panorama restaurant at the top of the mountain.
